name: dark.jenkins.output.console
description:
Foruth try:
- Fixefox fix, 
- changed default urls
- expanded to consoleText
- added !important entries to make override working

Changed to work with full and partial output log.
Darkens jenkins job output text to look more like a terminal with black background (actually, gray).
additional_info:
You should adjust address of your jenkins server. By default it's https://jenkins.example.com:8081/. You can change it to something like http://jenkins.yourcompany.com/ or whateveer you like.

Under Chrome edititing is rather straightforward :)

Under Firefox go to Stylish - Manage styles, find this style, right click and choose Edit and then adjust address for your jenkins server.
